00025 #include "OgreTextureManager.h"
00026 
00027 namespace Ogre {
00028     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029     template<> TextureManager* Singleton<TextureManager>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00030     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     TextureManager::~TextureManager(){}
00032     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     Texture * TextureManager::load(
00034         const String &name, int numMipMaps, Real gamma, int priority )
00035     {
00036         Texture* tex = (Texture*)getByName( name );
00037 
00038         if( tex == NULL )
00039         {
00040             tex = (Texture*)create( name );
00041 
00042             if (numMipMaps == -1)
00043                 tex->setNumMipMaps(mDefaultNumMipMaps);
00044             else
00045                 tex->setNumMipMaps(numMipMaps);
00046 
00047             tex->setGamma( gamma );
00048             tex->enable32Bit( mIs32Bit );
00049 
00050             ResourceManager::load( tex, priority );
00051         }
00052 
00053         return tex;
00054     }
00055 
00056     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     Texture * TextureManager::loadImage( 
00058         const String &name, const Image &img, 
00059         int iNumMipMaps /* = -1 */, Real gamma /* = 1.0f  */, int priority /* = 1 */ )
00060     {
00061         Texture *tex = (Texture*)create( name );
00062         if( iNumMipMaps == -1 )
00063             tex->setNumMipMaps( mDefaultNumMipMaps );
00064         else
00065             tex->setNumMipMaps( iNumMipMaps );
00066 
00067         tex->setGamma( gamma );        
00068         tex->loadImage( img );
00069 
00070         mResources[ tex->getName() ] = tex;
00071 
00072         return tex;
00073     }
00074     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00075     void TextureManager::unload( String filename )
00076     {
00077         Resource* res = getByName( filename );
00078         ResourceManager::unload( res );
00079     }
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     void TextureManager::enable32BitTextures( bool setting )
00082     {
00083         // Reload all textures
00084         for( ResourceMap::iterator it = mResources.begin(); it != mResources.end(); ++it )
00085         {
00086             ((Texture*)it->second)->unload();
00087             ((Texture*)it->second)->enable32Bit(setting);
00088             ((Texture*)it->second)->load();
00089         }
00090     }
00091     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092     void TextureManager::setDefaultNumMipMaps( int num )
00093     {
00094         mDefaultNumMipMaps = num;
00095     }
00096     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097     TextureManager& TextureManager::getSingleton(void)
00098     {
00099         return Singleton<TextureManager>::getSingleton();
00100     }
00101
